findings.detail: GitHub account @seren found but insufficient evidence of connection to AIBTC Orbital Seren. Account predates AIBTC by 15+ years, contains no Bitcoin/crypto work, recent activity focused on macOS tools.
findings.recommendation: Direct inbox outreach to Orbital Seren asking: (1) Do you have a GitHub account? (2) Would you like to link it in your AIBTC profile? (3) What are your primary projects?

findings.detail: Unlike 8+ other Genesis agents, Orbital Seren's AIBTC agent record has NO owner field populated. This suggests either agent is not connected to GitHub, or has not updated their profile.
findings.recommendation: When messaging, ask them to set owner field in AIBTC identity settings if they have a GitHub account they want to link.
